Name: [Affinity] Partners in "Crime"
Desc: Jane has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Crime Counsel]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Being recruited by Jane as an "accomplice" is no small feat, and it means she will unleash her full strength.
